verses.1: Kuamah in Pasianʼ min le i thuhilhnate hong gensiatsak loh nadingin sila khempeuh in a tote uh zahtak bawl ta uh hen.
verses.2: Thu um mi to-in a nei silate in upna sungah sanggam khat hi hang, ci-in ngaihsutna tawh a tote uh zahtak bawl loin om kha kei uh hen. Amauteʼ nasepna hangin hamphatna a ngah mite pen thu um mi le a it uh mite ahih manin a hoih zaw-in a sepsak ding uh a kilawm zaw ahi hi. Tu-a kong gen ding thute mi khempeuh tungah hilhin gen in.
verses.3: Topa Jesu Khris thu tawh a kituak lo, i biakna paizia tawh a kilehngatin thu tuamdang a hilh mite pen,
verses.4: a kiphasak mawkmawk hi uh a, bangmah a thei het lo ahi uh hi. Tua bang mite in thu kiseel thu kinial cihte ut belin nei uh a, hazatna, lungsim kituah lohna, kizahkona, a sia lamin ki-upmawhnate piangsak uh a,
verses.5: thuman thutak zui loin, a lungsim paizia uh a man nawn lo, biakna pen hauh theih nading lampi bekin a ngaihsun mite in a tawntungin kitot kiseelna a piangsak uh ahi hi.
verses.6: Pasian biakna hangin a neihsa teng tawh a lungkim mite pen biakna in mihau a suaksak takpi mah ahi hi.
verses.7: A taktakin ci lehang, leitungah mihingin i suah laitakin sumlepai tawh i suak kei a, i sih ciangin zong leitung panin bangmah i keng thei tuan kei hi.
verses.8: Tua ahih manin an nek tui dawn, nikten puansilh i neih nakleh a pha zo ahi hi.
verses.9: Ahi zongin a hau nuam mite in ze-etna a tuamtuam thuak a, duhhopna, huaihamna a haivai thute ah awkcipin, haksatna le siatna a tuah lawh uh hi.
verses.10: Sum deih luatna in siatna namkim piangsak hi. Mi pawl khat in sum deih lua liang uh ahih manin a upna panun pial khia-in gimna lungkhamna tampi a thuak lawh uh hi.
verses.11: Ahi zongin Pasianʼ mi ahi nangmah in tua thute khempeuh pelh inla, thuman thutak, Pasianʼ deih bangin nuntakna, upna, itna, kipna le lungnemna na neih zawh nadingin hanciam in.
verses.12: Upna thu ah hoihtakin nawk suak inla, mi tampiʼ zakin na pulak sa, Pasian in nangmah a hong piak nuntak tawntungna lenkip in.
verses.13: Na khempeuh tungah nuntakna a pia Pasian le Pontias Pilat mai ah hang takin thu a gen ngam Khris Jesuʼ mai ah nang ka hong thupiakna in:
verses.14: I Topa Jesu hong kilatkik Ni dongin paubaanna le mawhsakna om het loin nang hong kipia thute na zui in.
verses.15: Kumpiteʼ Kumpi, topateʼ Topa, thupha ngahin amah bek a lian pen ahi Pasian in hun a sak khatpeuh ciangin Jesu hong kilangsakkik ding hi.
verses.16: Tua i Pasian bek mah a si thei lo hi a, khuavak pha mahmah sungah om ahih manin kuamah in a kiang neh thei lo hi. Kuamah in amah mu ngei lo a, zong mu thei lo hi. A tawntungin amah kipahtawi henla, vanglian tawntung tahen. Amen.
verses.17: Tu hun a a hau mite kisathei kha loin, a kip lo hauhnate muan le suanin nei kha loin, eite in nuam takin i zat theih dingin citna tawh a hong pia Pasian a muan a suan nadingun na hilh in.
verses.18: A hoih nate semin, gamtat pha-in, citna lungsim nei-in midangte a hopnop nadingun na hilh in.
verses.19: Tua hileh mai lamah amauteʼ nuntak nading bulpi taktak ahi neihsate, amau adingin a khol mite ahi ding uh hi.
verses.20: Timoti aw, nang tungah a hong kipia thute hoihtakin na zui in. Mi pawl khatte in, “Thu theihna,” ci-in a ngaihsut khak uh, Pasianʼ thu tawh a kituak lo, thu kihai selnate na pelh in.
verses.21: Mi pawl khatte in tua bang pilna a nei-in kingaihsun uh a, upna thu bulpi khahsuahna-in a nei uh hi. Note khempeuh tungah Pasianʼ dikna thupha hong tung tahen.
